content.detailedDescription: I went outside and was waiting for a prospective roommate to show up, when i observed in the sky a large, grey, stationary object. at first i thought perhaps it was a blimp, but it was not moving what-so-ever. i could kind of see colored flashing lights around it, but it didn't seem to be on the ship, rather than permeating around it. i kept staring, wondering what the heck it was, and it stayed stationary for quite a few minutes. when the prospective roommate showed up, i went to greet him, but also wanted to show him what i saw. when i took him back to the spot where i had seen the craft, it was gone. not a trace of it. tripped me the frick out!!
content.summary: Stationary ufo hovering in orange county, ca

content.detailedDescription: Went out to smoke a cig and witnessed what looked like a star moving across the sky. i thought maybe it was a plane at first but this was not blinking. i called my friend and made him go outside and he was seeing what i was seeing. he recently saw possibly the same object on saint patrick's day at a local bar we frequently visit. he has that sighting on tape
content.summary: Star like moving across the sky from spnorth to south did not blink like plane was solid

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on hwy 32 coming from fort meade, md, moving at approx. 60 mph. somewhere near the vicinity of the exit to 295, i just happened to glance up toward the sky looking southwest. i noticed a shiny/ reflective cylindrical object hovering in the sky. my first thought was that it must have been a passenger airliner, but i noticed that it was not moving in a linear fashion, but hovering! i kept glancing at the object to ensure that i was indeed witnessing a hovering object.  i began to scan the skies for other flying objects and spotted what was clearly a passenger airliner moving from north to south, and appeared to be further away, in terms of direct line of sight, than the ufo.  although the plane appeared farther away, i could clearly distinguish it as an airplane, moving in a linear fashion, whereas i was unable to positively identify the hovering object.  i glanced back toward the ufo and it was indeed stationary and not moving, and i could not identify wing, rotars or anything that would indicate that it was of earthly origin.  i passed a row of tall trees on the south side of the highway, which obstructed my view, and i briefly lost visual contact with the ufo.  when i finally cleared the row of trees, which no more than 10 seconds (approx.) elapsed, i looked back in the direction of the ufo only to discover that it had completely vanished. i kept glancing back toward the direction where  the ufo was initially spotted, but i was unable to regain visual contact.
content.summary: Shiny reflective cylindrical hovering object

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on hwy 32 coming from fort meade, md, moving at approx. 60 mph. somewhere near the vicinity of the exit to 295, i just happened to glance up toward the sky looking southwest. i noticed a shiny/ reflective cylindrical object hovering in the sky. my first thought was that it must have been a passenger airliner, but i noticed that it was not moving in a linear fashion, but hovering! i kept glancing at the object to ensure that i was indeed witnessing a hovering object.  i began to scan the skies for other flying objects and spotted what was clearly a passenger airliner moving from north to south, and appeared to be further away, in terms of direct line of sight, than the ufo.  although the plane appeared farther away, i could clearly distinguish it as an airplane, moving in a linear fashion, whereas i was unable to positively identify the hovering object.  i glanced back toward the ufo and it was indeed stationary and not moving, and i could not identify wing, rotars or anything that would indicate that it was of earthly origin.  i passed a row of tall trees on the south side of the highway, which obstructed my view, and i briefly lost visual contact with the ufo.  when i finally cleared the row of trees, which no more than 10 seconds (approx.) elapsed, i looked back in the direction of the ufo only to discover that it had completely vanished. i kept glancing back toward the direction where  the ufo was initially spotted, but i was unable to regain visual contact.
content.summary: Shiny reflective cylindrical hovering object

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the parking lot across the street from nevada bobs. we were watching the full moon in the clear sky at about 9:20pm. suddenly, a bright orange spherical object appeared in the sky to the right of the moon. the object would grow and shrink. it looked like jupiter does in the night sky only orange. it would also stop and hover, and then move and stop again, while changing shape. the object continued until it located itself underneath a star. then, it seemed to disappear within itself.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange sphere in sky, changed shape, would grow and shrink and moved and would stop and hover and then descend and move

content.detailedDescription: Moon up close through my telescope!
content.summary: I challenge nasa to lunar footage!!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were watching tv when he noticed a bright light outside our sliding glass door. we both got up to look and it was a star-like object, very bright, on top of the mountain across from our house (maybe about a mile away). we look out that sliding glass door every night so this was an unusual white light, nothing like the house lights on the adjacent mountain. the bright light seemed to flash a little and my husband got out his binoculars. he said he saw the light flash blue briefly. after that the light faded away. 

we sat back down on the couch and not five minutes later the light came back, not as bright this time, and it was in a different spot on the mountain. i watched it while he went to find batteries for his night vision, but it had faded away then reappeared in a different spot on the mountain briefly before disappearing altogether by the time he had his night vision ready, so we weren't able to get a better look at the light. it was far too bright to be car headlights or lights from a house until it faded down, then it looked similar to the house lights in the area just before it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright star-like object on mountain

content.detailedDescription: Tower filmed on the moon with a celestron 130 slt telescope...18mm eyepiece...2x barlow lense...And 78x camcorder.  zoom at 28x optical zoom
content.summary: Moon tower

content.detailedDescription: While taking my evening walk, i first noticed what appeared to be a sommercial airliner traveling due west, normal flight path and leaving a contrail. then, a very small, but extremey bright object catch my attention in the same sector of sky. but, it appeared to be much, much higher in altitude that the airplane. most commerical flights are at 25,000 to 30,000 feet, but this object appeared to be atleast two or three times more distant and left no contrail and there was not noise. it was travel just about 090 or due east. i observed it for almost a minute and it just disappeared. if it was an air craft, it had to be at 60,000 to 70,000 feet. its extreme brightness and extreme altitude were the main factors catching my attention. i looked repeatedly back to the sky, but what ever it was, it just disappeared from sight.
content.summary: Exremely bright, star-like, shining as brightly as a small sun

content.detailedDescription: Husband saw it first and i came out back to observe it. couldn't tell its size, seemed to have back view of object, observed bright blue and white lights from back of object which seemed to be hovering over one spot, then it moved slowly, then it dissapeared suddenly out of sight
content.summary: Hovering object with blue and white bright lights no sound suddenly dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: This happened many years ago when i was 11 y.O. about 30 years ago circa 1974 in goleta california. this craft(?) landed/crashed(?) in my front yard that woke me up at around 3am. the craft(?) was oval shaped with an open door, there was no lights, just a street light that helped me see what was going on through my window. the craft(?) was about 30 ft. wide and 5 ft. high and it was giving off this low layer of mist/fog they made things hard to see at times. then this grey alien(?) came to my window and kept a watch on me as 2 others fixed(?) the craft(?) in my yard. they were little grey people (about 3.5 ft high) with big heads and big black eyes. it seemed that the one standing right outside my window telepathically kept me sitting up in bed, in fear, and it looked right at me the whole time, about 3.5 hours. the fear i felt was not normal, it was like they switched something in my brain that paralyzed me. most of the time all i could do was move was my eyes. also, sometimes i could see what they were doing/thinking through their eyes. they too seemed to be afraid, or at least in some sort of hurry. like if they didn't fix the craft soon it would blow up or something, who knows. sometimes i was able to reach into there heads and hurt them, and then i could move around more, it was a mind battle. they made all kinds of weird mechanical, clicking, humming, and clinking noises through the night as they worked. there was always this deep humming sound that i didn't notice at first. i sat up paralyzed in my bed for hours until they finished their work, then that deep humming sound got higher and higher in pitch, so high it went beyond my hearing range (dogs started barking) and it right then took off (it took off in a wink of the eye) with a bang (approx. 6:30am) that shook much of the neighborhood as i later learned. there was a smokey fog left behind that soon dissipated. and at that same time i heard a man yell "fire!" from the street (i guess he thought my house exploded). i never found out who that man was. i didn't miss any time (lost time) and there was a clock in my room. although my parents and some neighbors heard and felt the bang, no one believed what i saw. i was a paper boy for my area, so i knew most of my neighbors well. years later i realized that the bang was probably a sonic boom as it was just like that. funny how we don't get sonic booms from ufos for how fast they go. i guess they have tech to stop sonic booms. i guess what i saw had a broken anti-sonic boom device, lol (with a cracked smile). also the sun was just coming up at that same time, so i guess they were in a rush to get out of there before anyone else could see them as i guess their cloaking device was broke too, who knows. i know this all sounds crazy, but it did happen. i looked in my front yard for evidence but found nothing. also, i didn't know about small grey aliens until a few years later with close encounters of the third kind. i did know about the betty and barney hill abduction, and yes, i watched star trek. but this happened to me.. i was glad i didn't get abducted as other reported. but i do suffer from some pdss as i don't like sleeping during those hours and like to wake up at 3am. after all that, i have seen many ufos over the years that i won't report here in detail, mostly white orbs that look like stars from far away that change direction, stop, and zoom off at very fast speeds. i have seen these orbs close up too (20 feet away) and they looked like globe shaped light bulbs, about the size of a basketball. as such, i think the star the wise-men followed was an orb. i also saw a huge black triangle that i did report here under another alias > case# 37057 > i had never heard of anyone reporting anything like that until a few years later on unsolved mysteries (tv) where people in belgium saw the same thing. overall, i think that this whole ufo thing is a waste of time and we will never know what it really is, imho.... who knows, i surely don't, and i'm fine with that. remember to keep an open mind and question the evil status quo. don't be fooled by fools.
content.summary: Oval shaped with open door. this thing was on the ground at night, no lights but they were home.

content.detailedDescription:
See them all the time but this was the neatest one. crused then stopped high up in the sky, started to think it was just a star. then 20 minutes or so after that it did the swoop down with a tight turn then flung straight up at speeds i couldn't explain!  look up everyone and focus!! you need to train your eyes. its sorta like those images you look at to see the hidden image after you unfocus your eyes. same gig!! after getting it you'll start seeing things, usually you'll see 3 or 4 hauling ass together across the sky!! 
then after you start seeing them it just opens up more questions you can't answer!! is jesus, the gods, or our creators back for 2012, or have they been here the whole time? i ask them or "pray or talk via telepathy" when i see them to come down and have a beer but of course i get no love... o well maybe someday! it sure be fun to bring a bean bag and go for a ride someday ;) i heard their chairs are small from bob lazar..
and of course i took video with my smart phone and of course it wouldn't focus! i was sad..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Just another active day in the sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were getting ready for bed about 11:20 and he noticed this extremely bright object above the ridge between amenia and millerton ny, and just to the left of the communication. we got out binoculars and a camera and attempted to take photo's. we are at 1200 feet above sea level and have a panoramic 180 degree sky view facing nw. we watched this object with pulsing colors of white, blue, yellow and red for 15 minutes. judging by the stars that were out it was huge. we can't say how far it actually was as we can see a long dstance from our house. after 15 minutes it just suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: Ufo extremely bright stationary for 15 minutes next to communication towers

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were getting ready for bed about 11:20 and he noticed this extremely bright object above the ridge between amenia and millerton ny, and just to the left of the communication. we got out binoculars and a camera and attempted to take photo's. we are at 1200 feet above sea level and have a panoramic 180 degree sky view facing nw. we watched this object with pulsing colors of white, blue, yellow and red for 15 minutes. judging by the stars that were out it was huge. we can't say how far it actually was as we can see a long dstance from our house. after 15 minutes it just suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 2 bright lights seen between west and north west direction. one shot off quickly, the other remained for awhile. when i came back outside, the other light/ufo was gone. these were way too bright and low in the sky to be stars. friends could see them from different areas in houston, so it is doubtful that it was a spotlight or search light.
content.summary: 2 bright lights, too bright, too low and too close to be stars

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south bound on harbor blvd near the 405 fwy.  at this time i saw what appeared to be a diamond shape vehicle in the eastern sky abpproximately 1 mile from my location.  while i was driving i noticed the vehicle hovering, so i thought it was a heliocopter, but then it did not have the aviation lights.  also, it was much to big to be a heliocopter.  when arrived on harbor and baker it was still in the sky hovering/gliding south east direction.  i arrived at stater bros which is located on the south/east corner and got out of my pickup truck.  at this time the vehicle tilted on its side and then i was able to see it was in the shape of a diamond, or  actually two diamonds connected in the middle.  at first i thought it was a hoax but this vehicle was much too sophisticated to be a toy and very large. it made a hummimg noise that i could hear from approximately a mile away...  several people in the parking lot became spectators with me as we all watched in awe.
the vehicle at that time proceeded to fly/hover/glide higher in altitude and in a north/east direction.  i felt at tthat time it was in the orange county airport flight path ,so it should have shown up on their radar.  also at that time, the craft emmitted 4 brighter than the sun lights, or energy sources when it tilted.  ive see many things at night and in this area but nothing to this degree.  if it was a hoax it would of costed the person(s) in the millions of dollars to conduct...  i am very confident i was not the only person that was watching this because of the size and duration of the incident.  i know for a fact there are witnesses at the gas station, stater bros, and possibly more that were driving in a 2-4 square mile of the craft.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Driving s/b on harbor towards 405 fwy it was towards the east, like two diamonds joined side by side

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work when i noticed this brighter then normal flying object in the sky, i pulled over to watch it, to see if it had flashing lights like our aircraft's, it did not.. it was flying in one direction then just shot out in another direction, hour or so later i saw it again maybe another one not sure had same look though, just slowly move across the sky then stopped in one spot stayed there forever, 4 hours tops, i sat and watched it the whole time, one the occasions the lights got dark then bright again, one time the lights just went off when an airplane flew right around where it was the lights shot back on bright like blinding bright.. by midnight the light had vanished... my husband thinks im crazy but i know what i saw!!!!
content.summary: Bight blinking light hovered then lights dim then redish orange glow appeared, hovered for 4 hours tops just slowly moving

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work when i noticed this brighter then normal flying object in the sky, i pulled over to watch it, to see if it had flashing lights like our aircraft's, it did not.. it was flying in one direction then just shot out in another direction, hour or so later i saw it again maybe another one not sure had same look though, just slowly move across the sky then stopped in one spot stayed there forever, 4 hours tops, i sat and watched it the whole time, one the occasions the lights got dark then bright again, one time the lights just went off when an airplane flew right around where it was the lights shot back on bright like blinding bright.. by midnight the light had vanished... my husband thinks im crazy but i know what i saw!!!!
content.summary: Bight blinking light hovered then lights dim then redish orange glow appeared, hovered for 4 hours tops just slowly moving

content.detailedDescription: Just witnessed 5 red lights in the sky above our apartment complex. they were flying in a straight line and looked as if connected by a cord. the second converged on the front one until they were indistinguishable from each other. the red lights on the front 4 turned to a light white. the fifth in line appeared to be a plane and fell back from the others, its lights now furiously blinking red. the front 4 (well we only actually saw the 3 after the front 2 converged) turned left in a 45 degree angle and looked as f they were descending. the back plane like apparatus did not turn but still followed. they all disappeared. the sky was light and the clouds looked frozen. now the sky is black and cloudless. there was no sound emitted.
content.summary: 5 connected red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the bluewater bridge custom's lineup. i was going to work in port huron from my home in sarnia at 0830 on monday, april 2, 2012.  i caught a glimpse of an object off the corner of the customs building which was hovering.  it was silver and gave off a couple of coloured lights from one side.  i tried to find my phone to take a picture and when i looked back up, there were 2.  the other one seemed either smaller or farther away and was a white orb.  i had to go through customs and when i came out, they were gone.  i never saw them leave.  they were just gone.
i was so excited, i couldn't wait to tell people.
content.summary: Silver with some glowing lights of blue and violet out one side. the other one was white.

content.detailedDescription: This event was observed by a large group of witnesses including a highly credible coworker that wishes to remain anonymous.  while driving the coastal highway near the town of pacifica california, this individual observed two very large, glowing objects in the ocean and roughly ��� mile from the coastline.  the evening sky, at approximately 6:30pm, was 100% overcast with no direct sunlight anywhere in sight. the glowing objects appeared as sharp ovals from this distance.  but it was clear that the actual shapes were discs and were submerged in the ocean at an unknown depth.  a group of witnessed developed as vehicles stopped to see.  the observers shared their thoughts, and agreed that the two objects were in fact submerged and moving with indistinct patterns, but not in a way that resembled a worldly vehicle such as a submarine.  the group also concluded that sunlight could not be the cause because there were no breaks in the dense cloud cover.  furthermore, the lights continued to project into the late evening until about 9pm, well past sundown.  at some juncture during the event, a passing ship (perhaps a coast guard vessel) approached the objects in an attempt to investigate. the ship then quickly veered away from the objects in an apparent evasive maneuver to avoid confrontation.  at this juncture, most of the witnesses were in fear of their safety and left the scene.
content.summary: Two large, very bright objects submerged in ocean with distinct "disc" shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photographs for a project involving collecting images of our local downtown buildings. i did not observe anything mysterious that day. i was in the downtown area of my hometown, taking photos for my project.I was photographing the fading company logo on the back of an old, abandoned transfer & storage property. later that evening, i was copying & saving all the photos i had taken that day, & when i reviewed this one, i noticed an unusual object in the sky above the building. i imediately knew it was not a conventional aircraft, a camera defect, or a bird. i use a fully functioning digital camera to take my photos.
content.summary: I was taking photos for an unrelated project, & did not see the object until i reviewed the photos on my laptop

content.detailedDescription: I was in iowa visiting family. it was my nephews birthday so my 3 sister, 3 brothers and myself all were on the porch or our mom's house just talking ( no alcohol was consumed by anyone). it was a clear sky. you could see every star and just out of no where we hear this very loud rumble. we see the object for about 4 minutes than it leaves.
content.summary: Big, fast, non-human, harmless, arrtaive,

content.detailedDescription: On my way home, notice several brights lights and unusual object in air over trees.  slowed down to observe, didn't know what it was.  i was stunned couldn't believe what i was seeing.  it was about nine objects going straight up in the air.  went home got husband took him to sight he witness same unusual objects.  we were both in shock trying to figure out what we had witness.  we stayed there and watch the objects until they disappeared going up in the sky.
content.summary: Short decription is below on the next question

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed room watching t.V. when i looked up ,(i have a large bed room window that i can see right out of )i saw a very bright strange shaped light,  i watched it for about 20 minutes and it never left the spot. i thought that was strange so i got up and stood right on the bed 1" from my window and look out at it it was way to bright to be a plane and and it was round. i called my son in and he looked and say the same thing that it was strange. i went out and got my binoculors my son and i both looked through them and i wanted and even closer look so i went right out in to my yard with my binoculors. it seem at one point to pivet still hovering and i saw the bottom of it, it looked like a 7 pionted star like this * only 7 points not 5 each point from line to line was lit up with really bright lights and it had it looked like 3 beems of light coming straight down from it  and the lights pulsated . it stayed there for a good hour then. by the time i got back to my room it had moved. when i first seen it, it was north west, when i got to my room it was north and hovering i was staring right at it  and it moved back to the west a little more and in a blink of a eye it was gone. i phone cp 24 news but i think they thought i was crazy. i never told my son what i saw like shape or anything like that i gave him a paper to draw what he saw and i did the same we both drew the same thing. we are not very good drawers but you will get the idea. i would really like to hear back from you this is not the first time i have saw a ufo and other members of my family have also seen ufo's.
content.summary: Saw  strainge bright light in sky for over 1 hour

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bed room watching t.V. when i looked up ,(i have a large bed room window that i can see right out of )i saw a very bright strange shaped light,  i watched it for about 20 minutes and it never left the spot. i thought that was strange so i got up and stood right on the bed 1" from my window and look out at it it was way to bright to be a plane and and it was round. i called my son in and he looked and say the same thing that it was strange. i went out and got my binoculors my son and i both looked through them and i wanted and even closer look so i went right out in to my yard with my binoculors. it seem at one point to pivet still hovering and i saw the bottom of it, it looked like a 7 pionted star like this * only 7 points not 5 each point from line to line was lit up with really bright lights and it had it looked like 3 beems of light coming straight down from it  and the lights pulsated . it stayed there for a good hour then. by the time i got back to my room it had moved. when i first seen it, it was north west, when i got to my room it was north and hovering i was staring right at it  and it moved back to the west a little more and in a blink of a eye it was gone. i phone cp 24 news but i think they thought i was crazy. i never told my son what i saw like shape or anything like that i gave him a paper to draw what he saw and i did the same we both drew the same thing. we are not very good drawers but you will get the idea. i would really like to hear back from you this is not the first time i have saw a ufo and other members of my family have also seen ufo's.
content.summary: Saw  strainge bright light in sky for over 1 hour

content.detailedDescription: Riding east on i-70 just outside of dayton ohio  there was a tractor trailer with a unusual load on the trailer covered with tarp surrounded by police vehicles as a trucker you don't see four police cars escorting a truck that much with two pilot cars also saw a black suv in the traffic (not saying it was with them didn't get a look at tag of it. took pictures figured i would share them
content.summary: Object surrounded by police cars

content.detailedDescription: Riding east on i-70 just outside of dayton ohio  there was a tractor trailer with a unusual load on the trailer covered with tarp surrounded by police vehicles as a trucker you don't see four police cars escorting a truck that much with two pilot cars also saw a black suv in the traffic (not saying it was with them didn't get a look at tag of it. took pictures figured i would share them
content.summary: Object surrounded by police cars

content.detailedDescription: Outside bbq'ing. object "appeared" about a quarter mile away a few hundred feet above our house. glowed red and orange. turned se and drifted for 1 minute then disappeared, only re-appear back at the site of origin 1 minute later and again, drifted se and gone in less than 1 minute.
content.summary: Appeared twice within 3 minutes
